Question: In terms of impact on events, it was more than this person's personality that took effect.
Hints: This person acknowledged one illegitimate son: Charles Léon (1806–1881) by Eléonore Denuelle de La Plaigne,.
This person has become a worldwide cultural icon who symbolises military genius and political power.
Joséphine had her daughter Hortense marry this person's brother Louis.
